comment.author: 47393018@N00
comment._content: This photograph can't be from 1904 -- Harley's last game was with the Chicago Cubs on September 21, 1903. Dick Harley played outfield for the following teams: * St. Louis Browns (1897-1898) * Cleveland Spiders (1899 * Cincinnati Reds (1900-1901) * Detroit Tigers (1902) * Chicago Cubs (1903) He later went on to coach baseball at the University of Pittsburgh, Penn State, and Villanova. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dick_Harley

comment.author: 34215913@N06
comment._content: telling from the eyes, this is obviously a golem raised from the ashes of the human formerly known as...Dick Harley.
